title: Enhancing Programming Practical Skills: Introductory Accounting Learning Design Using Integrated Instructional Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Explain fundamental accounting concepts (double-entry bookkeeping, journalizing, financial statements) with over 85% accuracy
Solve classification and calculation problems for accounting ledgers using integrated text-diagram materials with at least 70% accuracy

Learners can apply accounting principles (double-entry bookkeeping, cost calculation) to create practical budget sheets/medical billing statements for three patient cost management scenarios and two technical project budgeting scenarios, and obtain peer feedback averaging 4/5 or higher on a 5-point scale.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
